data.text: @HildaSolis Stop defunding the Sheriff’s department.  End the hiring freeze.
@HildaSolis You forgot to mention the lawsuits that are coming because of your government sponsored theft: https://t.co/kMYr7O2MjK
@HildaSolis The state of emergency needs to END!!! WE THE PEOPLE are done!

@HildaSolis I have 2 tenants. Tenant #1 has done the best he could to pay his rent. We understood the circumstances. We appreciate him. Tenant #2 stopped paying rent, stopped communicating. He worked most of Covid period. We will need to raise rents to cover him and all our rising expenses.
@HildaSolis Tenants, do not fall for Hilda's pandering for votes. Her measures will hurt ALL tenants by making housing MORE expensive in the long run. She only cares about your votes now.
@HildaSolis Housing Provider: "One of my Covid scammer tenants made more than my husband did as a teacher in 2020 and didn’t pay any rent. Disgusting."

@HildaSolis You should be more mindful of the people you endorse. Garcia has lowered the living standards of the citizens of Long Beach and would bring this to #CA42. Vote anyone but Garcia. https://t.co/KqHszcUPOE
